// phase-animated variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/lc2BDG
// from colored faces https://shadertoy.com/view/lcSfWG
// from base https://shadertoy.com/view/XfSfDy


#define rot(a)  mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))               // rotation 
#define hue(v)  ( .6 + .6 * cos( 6.3*(v)  + vec4(0,23,21,0)  ) )
        
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9., a,f,d,l,c, s=.628, w=-radians(90.-116.565);
    vec3  R = iResolution, 
          A = vec3( cos(w),0, -sin(w) ),                   // North hemisphere axis (1st pie)
          B = vec3( cos(w)*cos(s),cos(w)*sin(s), sin(w) ), // South hemisphere axis (1st pie)
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -8.*R.y) - R ),          // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,0,15), q,                             // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R -.5 :           // comment for no mouse cam
                 vec3( .15,.07,0) * cos(.3*iTime + vec3(0,11,0)); 
          
    for ( O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01 )         // --- march scene
        q = p,
        q.yz *= rot(-6.*M.y),                              // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(-6.*M.x-1.57),
        
        a = atan(q.y,q.x),                                 // 5-pie symmetry
        f =  mod( a+s,s+s ) - s,
        q.xy = length(q.xy)*cos( f +vec2(0,11) ),          // fold to 1st pie
        
        c = sign(q.z), f = l = length(q.xy),               // dist to pole
        d = length(q-A), d<l ? l = d, c = round(a/6.28*5.) : c, // dist to North hemisphere axes
        d = min( length(q-B),length(q-B*vec3(1,-1,1)) ),   // dist to South hemisphere axes // why 2 lengthes ? // length(p-A)) 
        d<l ? l = d, c = round((a+5.*s)/6.28*5.) : c,      // â†’ c = face id, l = min dist to axis
     // t = length(q)- 1. - l,
        t = length(q)- 1.1 + .1*cos(12.*l-3.*iTime),       // face displacement
        
        p += .5*t*D;                                       // step forward = dist to obj   
       
   O *= O * 1.2;                                           // color scheme   
   O = mix( O, f==l ? vec4(0) : hue( c/5. ), smoothstep(.5,0.,l) ); // color spots
}
